title: [seocho] Add task-context trail inspection command
description: Provide one command/script to inspect recent context trail for a task (issue transitions, checks, landing result).

title: feat: translate inferred rules to Neo4j constraints/SHACL artifacts
description: Add exporter that converts extraction/rule_constraints.py profiles into Neo4j Cypher constraints and SHACL-compatible artifacts for governance workflows.

title: bug: pre-commit bd flush fails in initialized workspace
description: pre-commit hook runs bd sync --flush-only and fails with direct mode init error despite .beads/beads.db existing. Investigate workspace/prefix detection mismatch.

title: feat: add datatype/enum/range constraint mapping for DozerDB export
description: Extend /rules/export/cypher mapping beyond required rules; support enforceable checks or fallback validation hooks for datatype, enum, and range rules.

title: Add runtime file isolation policy
description: Keep daemon/sqlite runtime files out of tracked git state and document expected ignored paths.

title: Define embedded git clone policy for rig paths
description: Decide whether rig clones are submodules or ignored paths and enforce one policy to avoid embedded-repo warnings.

title: Enforce single beads path when redirect exists
description: Fail fast when rig .beads has redirect and local DB artifacts together; provide an auto-clean path.
